participant_1.background:
Riding horses is my favorite hobby.
I enjoy collecting autographs from my favorite celebrities and learning more about them.
I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors.
I need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work.
my mom is a checker at the local grocery store.

participant_2.background:
I won't fight, but I've had to defend myself on more than one occasion.
I do not do my laundry as often as I should.
i like football on tv.
My best friend died in a car accident when we were in college.
i have been married for five years.

content.text: Good! I'm watching some football on TV. It's a good game so far.
Cool! I'm not really into football, but I can appreciate a good game.
I love riding horses, and I like collecting autographs from my favorite celebrities. I also need my morning coffee to make it through the day at work!
I've never been on a horse before, but I've always wanted to try it. I don't really watch TV, but I do like to read about celebrities. I don't drink coffee, but I do love a good cup of tea!

Horses are amazing animals! They're so graceful and powerful. I love reading about celebrities too, and I'm always looking for new autographs to add to my collection. I'm not a big fan of tea, but I do like hot chocolate!
I've heard that horses are really smart animals. I've always wanted to learn how to ride one. I'm not sure if I'd be good at autographs, but I'd love to try it! I love hot chocolate too!
I'm sure you'd be great at riding horses! It's not as hard as it looks. Autographs are pretty easy, too. Just be sure to ask the celebrity nicely and be prepared for them to say no.
Thanks for the encouragement! I'll definitely have to try riding a horse someday. I'll keep that in mind if I ever meet a celebrity!
You're welcome! I hope you have a great day!
